greet.content:
創業者・山根良彦の一念により興った弊社も今年で{now}期目を迎えました。
お客様やお取引先様にご愛顧いただき、お陰様で創業以来黒字経営を続けられています。
人々の困難の為に奔走した先人達の理念を継承しつつ、今後も新たなことに挑戦し続け、人々の生活を支えられるよう邁進していく所存です。
greet.name: 廣田敬司

date: as of the end of March 2024

greet.content:
Founded by the determination of our founder, Yoshihiko Yamane,
 our company is celebrating it's {now}th anniversary this year.
 We are grateful for the support of our customers and business partners, and thanks to everyone,
 we have been profitable management since our establishment.
 We will inherit the ideals of our predecessors who tirelessly worked to alleviate the difficulties of people, continue to venture into new endeavors, and strive to support people's lives.
greet.name: Keiji Hirota

history.title: May 1977
history.description: Established in Tokushima City, Tomitabashi-dori 8-chome with the purpose of wholesale and incidental construction of industrial rubber products, water supply materials, LP gas materials and equipment, housing equipment, etc.

history.title: February 1978
history.description: Incorporated as Kabushiki Kaisha Taishin with a capital of 10 million yen.

history.title: May 1979
history.description: Acquired a 500m² site for the construction of the company building at 3-2-4 Kitajimada, Tokushima City.

history.title: December 1979
history.description: Completion of the company building at 3-2-4 Kitajimada, Tokushima City, with 693m² of floor space over 3 floors.

history.title: June 1981
history.description: Acquired a 200m² company-owned site at 3-2-7 Kitajimada, Tokushima City.

history.title: May 1982
history.description: Conducted a study trip to Hokkaido to commemorate the 5th anniversary of the founding.

history.title: October 1982
history.description: Acquired a 133m² company-owned site at 3-2-9 Kitajimada, Tokushima City.

history.title: December 1983
history.description: Capital increased to 17 million yen.

history.title: April 1985
history.description: Acquired a 100m² company-owned site at 3-2-8 Kitajimada, Tokushima City.

history.title: October 1986
history.description: Capital increased to 22.4 million yen.

history.title: March 1987
history.description: Became the manufacturer and sales agent for Magnesium Simulated Positive Mg Denbo, an electric contact preventive agent for buried pipes.

history.title: May 1987
history.description: Held a commemorative trade fair for the 10th anniversary of the founding.

history.title: June 1987
history.description: Visited a training facility in China as part of the 10th anniversary events.

history.title: July 1987
history.description: Established Taishin Kyoeikai (Taishin Mutual Prosperity Association) with 44 member companies based on proposals from customers.

history.title: August 1988
history.description: Conducted factory visits to suppliers from 1988 to 1991 and held annual meetings of the mutual prosperity association.

history.title: October 1992
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 15th anniversary commemoration and Taishin Kyoeikai held its 5th annual meeting.

history.title: May 1993
history.description: Became the nationwide manufacturer and distributor for Gas Meter Cross Units developed through original invention and development.

history.title: July 1995
history.description: Acquired a 106m² company-owned site at 3-2-3 Kitajimada, Tokushima City.

history.title: July 1995
history.description: Acquired a 1071m² company-owned site at 2-30-9 Kitajimada, Tokushima City.

history.title: February 1996
history.description: Expanded warehouse with a 330m², 2-story extension at 3-2-3 Kitajimada, Tokushima City.

history.title: June 1997
history.description: Capital increased to 27 million yen.

history.title: June 1997
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 20th anniversary commemoration (1st group) and Taishin Kyoeikai held its 10th annual meeting.

history.title: July 1997
history.description: Taishin Kyoeikai held its 10th annual meeting.

history.title: September 1997
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 20th anniversary commemoration (2nd group).

history.title: October 1999
history.description: Received the Tokushima City Mayor's Award at the 38th Tokushima Invention and Improvement Exhibition.

history.title: October 2001
history.description: Received the National Invention Association Award at the 13th Shikoku Regional Invention Awards Ceremony.

history.title: April 2002
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 25th anniversary commemoration (1st group) and held the inaugural meeting of the new Taishin Kyoeikai.

history.title: April 2002
history.description: Held the inaugural meeting of the new Taishin Kyoeikai.

history.title: September 2002
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 25th anniversary commemoration (2nd group).

history.title: May 2006
history.description: Acquired a 568m² company-owned site in Kitajimada-cho, Tokushima City.

history.title: April 2007
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 30th anniversary commemoration (1st group).

history.title: October 2007
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 30th anniversary commemoration (2nd group).

history.title: September 2014
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 35th anniversary commemoration (1st group).

history.title: October 2014
history.description: Visited a training facility as part of the 35th anniversary commemoration (2nd group).

history.title: August 2015
history.description: Capital increased to 30 million yen.

greet.content:
创始人山根良彦的一念之下，我们公司今年迎来了{now}周年纪念。
 感谢客户和合作伙伴的支持，多亏了大家，我们自创立以来一直保持盈利。
我们将继承先辈们为了解决人们的困境而不懈努力的理念，继续挑战新事物，
 并不断努力支持人们的生活。
greet.name: 广田敬司

history.description: 取得了位于德岛市北岛田3-2-8的100平方米公司自有地。

history.title: 1986年10月
history.description: 注册资本增至2240万日元。

history.title: 1987年3月
history.description: 成为埋设管道的电触防护剂镁状Mg Denbo的开发制造销售商。

history.title: 1987年5月
history.description: 举办了创立10周年纪念展览会。

history.title: 1987年6月
history.description: 作为创立10周年纪念活动进行了中国考察工厂参观。

history.title: 1987年7月
history.description: 根据客户提议成立了泰信共荣会（44家成员公司）。

history.title: 1988年8月
history.description: 从1988年到1991年进行了供应商工厂参观，并举办了泰信共荣会的年度会议。

history.title: 1992年10月
history.description: 作为创立15周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观，并举行了第5届年度会议。

history.title: 1993年5月
history.description: 通过煤气表交叉单元的发明开发成为全国制造商和经销商。

history.title: 1995年7月
history.description: 取得了位于德岛市北岛田3-2-3的106平方米公司自有地。

history.title: 1995年7月
history.description: 取得了位于德岛市北岛田2-30-9的1071平方米公司自有地。

history.title: 1996年2月
history.description: 在德岛市北岛田3-2-3进行了仓库扩建，增加了330平方米，2层楼高。

history.title: 1997年6月
history.description: 注册资本增至2700万日元。

history.title: 1997年6月
history.description: 作为创立20周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第1组），并举行了第10届年度会议。

history.title: 1997年7月
history.description: 泰信共荣会举行了第10届年度会议。

history.title: 1997年9月
history.description: 作为创立20周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第2组）。

history.title: 1999年10月
history.description: 在德岛市第38届发明创造展上获得了市长奖。

history.title: 2001年10月
history.description: 在第13届四国地区发明表彰大会上获得了全国发明协会奖。

history.title: 2002年4月
history.description: 作为创立25周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第1组），并举行了新泰信共荣会的第1次会议。

history.title: 2002年4月
history.description: 举行了新泰信共荣会的第1次会议。

history.title: 2002年9月
history.description: 作为创立25周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第2组）。

history.title: 2006年5月
history.description: 取得了德岛市北岛田町的568平方米公司自有地。

history.title: 2007年4月
history.description: 作为创立30周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第1组）。

history.title: 2007年10月
history.description: 作为创立30周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第2组）。

history.title: 2014年9月
history.description: 作为创立35周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第1组）。

history.title: 2014年10月
history.description: 作为创立35周年纪念活动进行了泰信共荣会考察工厂参观（第2组）。

history.title: 2015年8月
history.description: 注册资本增至3000万日元。
